name: Tunnel of Doom
description:
Tunnel of Doom takes place in 1903 at Goldcrest, a small mining town. The mayor has shut down the mine until further notice due to an unknown incident. Angel, a local woman and wife to one of the trapped miners decides to enter the mines to find her husband and find out what happened.

Key Features

  • Beautiful hand-drawn pixel graphics
  • Procedural dungeons make each playthrough unique
  • Real-time battles with tower defense elements
